a.style: font-family:'Playfair Display', Georgia, 'Times New Roman', 'Liberation Serif', serif

text.tspan: Famines by level of GDP per capita at the time
Famines that are estimated to have killed 100,000 people or more. GDP per capita is adjusted for inflation and
for differences in living costs between countries. The World Peace Foundation's triggers seek to summarize the
Data source: Bolt and van Zanden - Maddison Project Database 2023; V-Dem (2024); World Peace Foundation (2024)
Note: Famines are plotted by their start date.
